description: Character presets for foot sync generation. Copy this file to 'foot_sync_presets.json' and add your custom characters.

Generic.description: Default preset for standard biped characters

notes.toe: Toe height parameters - min: heel strike, neutral: flat, max: toe lift
notes.feet: Foot height parameters - min: contact, neutral: ground, max: swing phase
notes.angle_speed: Angular velocity threshold in degrees per frame for rotation detection
notes.min_movement: Minimum displacement per frame to detect movement (units)
notes.height_tolerance: Vertical tolerance for ground contact detection (units)
notes.motion_range.feet: Feet amplitude threshold - above this value = large motion
notes.motion_range.toe: Toe amplitude threshold - above this value = large motion
